content.html: It’s the reason Twitter still exists. The platform took off originally because people were building third party apps to do all kinds of things that weren’t possible in the client. They were implementing features that people wanted before the Twitter dev team could.
content.value: It’s the reason Twitter still exists. The platform took off originally because people were building third party apps to do all kinds of things that weren’t possible in the client. They were implementing features that people wanted before the Twitter dev team could.
